General.Name: Sejong Medical Co. Ltd
General.Description: Sejong Medical Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and supplies laparoscopic surgery systems and equipment in South Korea. It offers trocar, single port, specimen pouch, suction irrigation, suture loop, smoke filter, BUMI, and ETC products. Sejong Medical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Paju, South Korea. As of September 30, 2022, Sejong Medical Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of CANARIABIO M Inc..
